messages.title: FAIR IS WORTH FIGHTING FOR
messages.content: Re-building the economy and protecting our future environment are both essential tasks. To achieve this aims requires bold ideas, imagination and political will. Plus the strong determination and dedication this time. The Green Party is fighting up for the challenges of the 21st century. Climate change will bring new jobs and provide better public transport - affordable too to all.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Green MPs will demand a 'Living Wage' to ensure low paid workers earn enough to provide for themselves and their families. We will fight for a fair financial deal, with community banks providing realistic loans to families and small businesses.

We think it's unfair that hospitals and health centers are treated like businesses rather than vital public services. We want to make sure no more public money is wasted on badly planned privatisation schemes. Green MPs will fight to make sure local services are easy to access and are truly local. We will stop cuts, closures and privatisation within our NHS and protect the jobs of public sector workers.
Green industries will provide more employment.

issues.economy: Green MPs will demand a 'Living Wage' to ensure low paid workers earn enough to provide for themselves and their families. We will fight for a fair financial deal, with community banks providing realistic loans to families and small businesses.
issues.environment: Re-building the economy and protecting our future environment are both essential tasks. To achieve this aims requires bold ideas, imagination and political will.
issues.health: We think it's unfair that hospitals and health centers are treated like businesses rather than vital public services. We want to make sure no more public money is wasted on badly planned privatisation schemes. Green MPs will fight to make sure local services are easy to access and are truly local. We will stop cuts, closures and privatisation within our NHS and protect the jobs of public sector workers.

endorsements.endorsement: Susan with Caroline Lucas MP and the Green Leader.

quotes.text: Vote Green to get a fairer deal for the people of East Worthing & Shoreham.

images.caption: Green Party fighting the growing gap between rich and poor
A million new jobs - Green industries will provide more employment
MEP awards 2009 - The Greens are ahead!
